import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; function TourDetails() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleBooking = () => { navigate('/book-tour'); // Navigate to booking page or handle the booking logic }; return (

Discover Switzerland

Itinerary

Day 1: Arrival in Zurich - Explore the old town.

Day 2: Visit Lucerne and Mount Titlis.

Day 3: Day trip to Interlaken and the Jungfrau Region.

Day 4: Departure.

Inclusions

  • All entry fees to attractions and museums
  • Transportation by coach
  • 3 nights accommodation in a 4-star hotel
  • Daily breakfast

Exclusions

  • International flights
  • Travel insurance

Pricing

Standard Package: $999 per person

Luxury Package: $1999 per person

Gallery

); } export default TourDetails;
